{"step_by_step_thinking": "The safest and most efficacious solvent to dissolve Gutta Percha is Chloroform. Halothane is a volatile anesthetic and not commonly used as a solvent. Methylchloroform is a chlorinated hydrocarbon solvent that has been phased out due to its harmful effects on the environment and human health. Xylene is a solvent commonly used in histology and pathology laboratories, but it is not typically used to dissolve Gutta Percha.", "answer_choice": "B. Chloroform"}
